The image shared on social media shows a: CAA rally at Shaheen Bagh, with the claim that one of them is Jashodaben, Prime Minister Narendra Modi's wife.
The image was originally posted on a Fac: 3. Alt News conducted a reverse image search and found that the same image was uploaded on a Deccan Chronicle report from 2016, where Jashodaben was seen participating in a protest against the demolition of slums in Mumbai.
Similar images were also uploaded by oth: Day, Catch News, and The Hindu, further supporting the authenticity of Jashodaben's participation in the protest.
